Text: GREAT SET!!! NOBODY DOES MUSIC LIKE THIS ANYMORE..

I put Jim Hall in an elite group of guitarists that have a smooth "attack"    2 others being Wes Montgomery and Pat Metheny.  I don't mean that attack is bad; Mingus was THE attacker and his status is unassailable in Jazz......Attack being that initial spike in the ADSR envelope, the initial punch of each note......pardon my jargon
